price: আৰু আমি জানি বুজিয়ে সিহঁতক সকলো সৃষ্টিৰ ওপৰত নিৰ্বাচিত কৰিছিলোঁ।
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqadi ikh'tarnāhum ʿalā ʿil'min ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
